name: Grapple Golf (Moomit)
description:
Grapple Golf!

  • In the platformer puzzle game "Grapple Golf," you advance using a golf ball with a grappling hook! Get through the levels as quickly and with as little strokes as you can to get better score and prizes!
  • Due to the fact that this game is still being developed, it could have some problems or bugs that will be resolved later.
